Text:
Appreciate you putting up the web rips of the show. Was up at the cottage and missed him for all of July so far. Any chance you have those?

I usually get him over the net up in Canada, so you’re my next source!

Thanks

Herkimer.


•∆•
V-V

Actually, Glenn was on vacation starting July 1st which I uploaded with guest host Doc Thompson.  I skipped the entire week he was out and picked it back up on the 11th when he returned.

To sum up, you didn't miss anything in July as long as you picked up the 11th and 12th (and now the 13th).
